Body: I'm running a terraform apply -auto-approve command to update one resource in Azure and it's hanging up on the Cost Estimation part taking more than 7 minutes to move on (sometimes longer than that). Is there a param to pass that will skip the cost estimation piece of a terraform apply command?
Title: Terraform apply - ignore cost estimation

history.Text: I'm running a terraform apply -auto-approve command to update one resource in Azure and it's hanging up on the Cost Estimation part taking more than 7 minutes to move on (sometimes longer than that).  Is there a param to pass that will skip the cost estimation piece of a terraform apply command?

filtered-sentences.text: I'm running a terraform apply -auto-approve command to update one resource in Azure and it's hanging up on the Cost Estimation part taking more than 7 minutes to move on (sometimes longer than that).
Is there a param to pass that will skip the cost estimation piece of a terraform apply command?

answers.Body:
This feature is only available in Terraform Enterprise. Have you tried to reach out to them through support?

https://www.terraform.io/docs/enterprise/support/index.html
